name: The Wine And History Aficionado'S
description:
History in the morning, Wine in the afternoon on this private tour!
Come discover one of Europe's most historical cities. Built by the Romans where four rivers intersect, this city has been a hub of societies through the ages and still hosts one of the most well preserved Jewish Quarters in Europe! 
Your guide will help you explore the Cathedral, Roman Ruins, and the Jewish Quarter; just some of the sites in this beautiful Medieval City.
